  • Table only

→ Styles collection

Text only

Contains fields for a title and a text block. They will always be aligned to the left of the viewport.

Ut eu sem integer vitae justo

Table only

Contains fields for a title and a text block for the table. They will always be aligned to the left of the viewport.

Approximate levels of oxygen in air, normal tissues and prostate tumors

mm Hg % oxygen Comment
760 100 Atmospheric pressure
160 21.1 Approx. level of oxygen in inspired air
107 14.1 Approx. level of oxygen in lung alveoli
40 5.3 Mid-range of oxygen levels in peripheral tissues
8.6 1.1 Mid-range of oxygen levels in solid tumors
30 3.9 Level in normal prostate [4]
6 0.8 LNCaP prostate tumour xenografts [5]
2 0.3 Level in human prostate tumours in situ [4]

Text and Image

Contains fields for a title, a text block and an image. There are also options for the image size (third, half, two-thirds) and position (left or right).

Text and Standout

Contains fields for a title, a text block and a standout title. There is also options for the standout position (left or right).

Text and Table

Contains fields for a title, a text block and a text block for the table. There is also options for the table position (left or right).
